'''Soundscapes+ Add-On''' is an [[add-on]] that adds sounds that adapt to the players' location, time, weather, and surrounding blocks, promoted by [[Mojang Studios]] for the [[New Years' Sale 2024]].

== Additions ==

=== Items ===
* [[File:Book SS.png|32px|class=pixel-image]] Book
** Gives to player information about additions.
